document.full_text: the american lindsey vonn and her friendly german rival, maria riesch, will compete in four consecutive skiing races over four days to determine the 2011 fis overall world cup champion.
document.title: skiing: showdown between riesch and vonn approaches climax
lines_and_colors: the american lindsey vonn and her friendly german rival, maria riesch, will compete in four consecutive skiing races over four days to determine the 2011 fis overall world cup champion.
